Salt has received a number of mixed reviews prior to its July 23 release. The Hollywood Reporter called the film, slick, light summer entertainment that should re-establish Angelina Jolie as`` an action star.'' Ban Ki-moon and his buddies have up until now have served the singular goal of placing their friend Alassance Alassane Ouattara at the head of Ivory Coast, he said in a press release, adding it was now up to Ivorians to bring peace to the country. ,'' many millions more will join the ranks of the uninsured.`` To say we should return to where we were is beyond comprehension,'' Bernie Sanders said. But, David Vitter said, we want full repeal of Obamacare for a simple reason-- the big problem with the bill, the big problem with the plan aren't at the margins, they are the core, and the big problems can't be fixed with... changing a comma, or changing the punctuation or revising one or two or five or 10 sentences. The big problems are at the core, with the demand that every man, woman and child in the nation has to go onto the market and buy a particular product. `` That's why we demand repeal,'' said David Vitter , who said`` we will be replacing this huge burdensome bill with a targeted approach.'' `` The href="http://uk.news.yahoo.com/fc/x-factor.html"> X Factor,'' which has a U.S. launch this year, won the talent show category at Britain's National Television Awards on Wednesday, beating Britain's Got Talent, `` Dancing on Ice'' and`` Strictly Come Dancing.''
